item.title: Bitcoin slides as Fed rate cut hopes diminish
item.description: Bitcoin's drop below $115,00 is the lowest the cryptocurrency has fallen since July 11.

item.title: ‘Trump’s trade deals are illegal,’ Piper Sandler warns, predicting a Supreme Court smackdown by June 2026
item.description: The investment bank thinks a 9-0 ruling against Trump is likely. That doesn't mean the tariffs will just go away.

item.title: 3 cost-conscious fertility startups that are making egg-freezing more accessible
item.description: From price-comparison tools to freezing eggs for free in exchange for donating some.

item.title: New Orleans ‘Trash King’ faces a fight to keep cleaning Bourbon Street
item.description: The mayor fired Sidney Torres IV, and his company, IV Waste, but locals don't want another cleaner: "It’s not even in the same solar system."

item.title: Are college athletes employees of their schools? Trump signs executive order asking labor authorities to figure it out
item.description: Trump directed the secretary of labor and the National Labor Relations Board to clarify the status of collegiate athletes through guidance or rules.
